snippet: President Benigno S. Aquino III made the plea a day after the group lost several members in a violent clash with Malaysian police officers.
lead_paragraph: President Benigno S. Aquino III made the plea a day after the group lost several members in a violent clash with Malaysian police officers.

headline.seo: Philippine Leader Calls for Surrender of Group in Malaysia
headline.main: Philippine Leader Calls for Surrender of Group in Malaysia
headline.print_headline: Philippine Leader Calls for Surrender of Group in Malaysia
